text: Byrum Fred "By" Saam, Jr. (September 11, 1914 â€“ January 16, 2000) was an American sportscaster. His main focus in his career was announcing baseball and football games in Philadelphia. His play-by-play jobs include the following: *College Football on CBS Radio *Minneapolis Millers *Minnesota Golden Gophers football *Temple Owls football *Temple Owls basketball *Penn Quakers football *Penn Quakers basketball *Villanova Wildcats football *Villanova Wildcats basketball *Philadelphia Athletics *Philadelphia Phillies *MLB on NBC Radio *Philadelphia Eagles *Philadelphia Ramblers *Philadelphia Warriors Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:1914 births Category:2000 deaths
title: Byrum Saam
